authtoken.comment: Create your API access  token at https://pool.braiins.com/settings/access/ with limited read-only access, and not web access
outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
priceurl.comment: The url that provides the pricing information from bisq marketplace
priceCheckInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before checking the price again to use for profitability. 10800 is 3 hours
kwhPrice.comment: The price per killowatt you pay for electricity to run the miner
kwhUsed.comment: The amount of energy used by the miner to run per hour expressed as killowatt hours.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorHeader.comment: The color to use for the image header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMiningReward.comment: The color to draw the bar for the mining reward expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBOSReward.comment: The color to draw the bar for the Braiins OS reward expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorReferralReward.comment: The color to draw the bar for any Referral rewards expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineLight.comment: The color to draw the left and bottom of the graph outline expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineDark.comment: The color to draw the top and right and background dashed lines of the graph outline expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMovingAverage.comment: The color of the 14 day moving average line overlaying daily graph bars expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataValue.comment: The color of the data field values expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBreakEvenMiss.comment: The color of the text showing the break even amount when it is not met expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBreakEvenGood.comment: The color of the text showing the break even amount when it is met expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
